name: Broken Inside
description:
Don't look too close in the mirror... You never know what's looking back at you.

We recommend using headphones and fullscreen for the full experience.

Controls:

Use the cursor to navigate.
Arrows or AWSD to move.
Hold Shift to run.
Press space to jump.

Find the best hiding spots and beware of your surroundings.


Broken Inside is a final College project, feel free to leave feedback in the comments.
